typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> hierarchieArticle
hierarchieArticle select(mapColumn(
		NoCanalDist = CDis,
		NoArt = Article,
		Article = Description,
		NoNiv1 = {N1.locale},
		NoNiv2 = {N2.locale},
		NoNiv3 = {N3.locale},
		NoNiv4 = {N4.locale},
		NoNiv5 = {N5.locale},
		NoNiv6 = {N6.locale},
		NoNiv7 = {N7.locale},
		Niv1 = {N1.locale.designation},
		Niv2 = {N2.locale.designation},
		Niv3 = {N3.locale.designation},
		Niv4 = {N4.locale.designation},
		Niv5 = {N5.locale.designation},
		Niv6 = {N6.locale.designation},
		Niv7 = {N7.locale.designation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameArticle
RenameArticle aggregate(groupBy(Article),
	NoCanalDist = max(NoCanalDist),
		NoArt = max(NoArt),
		NoNiv1 = max(NoNiv1),
		NoNiv2 = max(NoNiv2),
		NoNiv3 = max(NoNiv3),
		NoNiv4 = max(NoNiv4),
		NoNiv5 = max(NoNiv5),
		NoNiv6 = max(NoNiv6),
		NoNiv7 = max(NoNiv7),
		Niv1 = max(Niv1),
		Niv2 = max(Niv2),
		Niv3 = max(Niv3),
		Niv4 = max(Niv4),
		Niv5 = max(Niv5),
		Niv6 = max(Niv6),
		Niv7 = max(Niv7)) ~> Unique
Unique derive(CanalDist = iif(NoCanalDist=="43", "Chantier", "Diffus")) ~> CanalDist
CanalDist select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		NoCanalDist,
		NoArt,
		NoNiv1,
		NoNiv2,
		NoNiv3,
		NoNiv4,
		NoNiv5,
		NoNiv6,
		NoNiv7,
		Niv1,
		Niv2,
		Niv3,
		Niv4,
		Niv5,
		Niv6,
		Niv7,
		CanalDist
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SortieNomenclatureProduit.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> nomenclatureProduit
